17 class navigationClass
18 {
19  public:
20  navigationClass(ros::Publisher &drive);
21  bool moveTo(float desiredPose[2]);
22  float *currentPose;
24  private:
25  bool motion(ros::Publisher &drive, float desPose[3], float curPose[3]);
26 
27  int navigationState = 0;
28  ros::Publisher drivePub;
29 
30  const float toleranceDistance = 0.1;
31  const float toleranceAngle = 2;
32  const float toleranceAngleLinVel = 30;
33  const float angularVel = 1;
34  const float linearVel = 0.3;
35  const float decelDist = 0.5;
36 };
41 navigationClass::navigationClass(ros::Publisher &drive): drivePub(drive){}
42 
47 bool navigationClass::moveTo(float desiredPose[2])
48 {
49  float desiredAngle;
50  switch(navigationState)
51  {
52  // waiting for new goals
53  case 0:
54  navigationState ++;
55  cout << "TURTLEBOT MOTION:" << endl;
56  cout << " new state: " << navigationState << ": New goal received" << endl;
57  break;
58 
59  // publish nav_status: in motion
60  case 1:
61  navigationState ++;
62  cout << " new state: " << navigationState;
63  break;
64 
65  // calculate dif to new goal
66  case 2:
67  cout << ": Difference: x: " << (desiredPose[0] - currentPose[0]);
68  cout << "\ty: " << (desiredPose[1] - currentPose[1]) << endl;
69  navigationState ++;
70  cout << " new state: " << navigationState << ": Drive to new goal" << endl;
71  break;
72 
73  // align towards new goal
74  case 3:
75  if(motion(drivePub, desiredPose, currentPose))
76  {
77  navigationState ++;
78  cout << " new state: " << navigationState << ": Goal reached" << endl;
79  }
80  break;
81 
82  // drive to new goal
83  case 4:
84  navigationState = 0;
85  return true;
86  }
87  return false;
88 }
89 
94 bool navigationClass::motion(ros::Publisher &drive, float desPose[3], float curPose[3])
95 {
96  float difPose[3] = {0,0,0};
97 
98  // calculate absolute angle to goal
99  for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
100  {
101  difPose[i] = desPose[i] - curPose[i];
102  if(abs(difPose[i]) < toleranceDistance)
103  difPose[i] = 0;
104  }
105  float absAngleToGoal = atan2(difPose[1], difPose[0]) * 180 / PI;
106 
107  // calculate distance to goal
108  float distToGoal = sqrt(pow(difPose[0], 2) + pow(difPose[1], 2));
109 
110  float relAngle = absAngleToGoal - curPose[2];
111  while(relAngle > 180)
112  relAngle = -360+relAngle;
113  while (relAngle < -180)
114  relAngle = 360-relAngle;
115 
116  if(relAngle < -toleranceAngleLinVel)
117  relAngle = -toleranceAngleLinVel;
118  else if(relAngle >= toleranceAngleLinVel)
119  relAngle = toleranceAngleLinVel;
120 
121  geometry_msgs::Twist driveVal;
122 
123  if(distToGoal > toleranceDistance)
124  {
125  driveVal.angular.z = mapValue(relAngle, -90, 90, -angularVel, angularVel);
126 
127  driveVal.linear.x = mapValue(abs(relAngle), 0, toleranceAngleLinVel, linearVel, 0);
128  if(distToGoal < decelDist)
129  driveVal.linear.x = mapValue(driveVal.linear.x, decelDist, 0, driveVal.linear.x, 0);
130  drive.publish(driveVal);
131  }
132  else
133  {
134  driveVal.angular.z = 0;
135  driveVal.linear.x = 0;
136  drive.publish(driveVal);
137  return 1;
138  }
139  return 0;
140 }
